title: The chat restrict system is unbelievable!
body:
I'll just post the two games included.
This system is so flawed that it only check the words being said without knowing the context at all. I doubt it even checks what the one reported me said in game. That master yi duo can feed 500 games, go aniv and tahm, without getting punished.  These feeders can feed all game and flame yet still report me after the game. It was 3v1 in chat, I am sure only the feeders reported me. But guess what? Let's punish me for flaming them when they are clearing just ruining the game for everyone. 

Game 1
I was jungle, got a few kills early. But this zed is just feeding ziggs 1v1 in lane non-stop. He went 2/8 then started blaming me and the team. Calling ziggs broken and shit. You can literally check the match history. He was saying worse shit to everyone as well.

JJKILLER: are u guys normal
JJKILLER: my last 2 teams were full retards
JJKILLER: u put a spin on that?
JJKILLER: wtf
JJKILLER: am
JJKILLER: i
JJKILLER: playing
JJKILLER: 3rd game in a row
JJKILLER: lmao you are retarded
JJKILLER: cant zed vs ziggs
JJKILLER: keep feeding
JJKILLER: umm
JJKILLER: 5 kills participation
JJKILLER: out of 6
JJKILLER: eh
JJKILLER: so gud
JJKILLER: just ff
JJKILLER: can u just end
JJKILLER: zed is blaming me
JJKILLER: lmao
JJKILLER: this kid
JJKILLER: this zed
JJKILLER: got rekt so hard
JJKILLER: lost his mind
JJKILLER: lmao
JJKILLER: you cant win if ur shit
JJKILLER: 3/8
JJKILLER: yi is stupid
JJKILLER: so lets feed instead
JJKILLER: goes 3/8
JJKILLER: at least you can still blame jg
JJKILLER: 3/9*
JJKILLER: 3/9
JJKILLER: get rekt in lane
JJKILLER: cry all game
JJKILLER: when someone calls ziggs broken
JJKILLER: you know hes retarded
JJKILLER: i gave up trying with retards
JJKILLER: this kid
JJKILLER: ziggs rekt his brain out
JJKILLER: flaming

Game 2
This was before the game with zed. First off the trist didnt leash. Then the bot feeds nonstop all game. Thresh even switched to 6 tears and runs mid. Plus I didn't talk much.
JJKILLER: wtf is this leash
JJKILLER: lmao
JJKILLER: u want me to afk?
JJKILLER: im done with this game
JJKILLER: i didnt want to take it
JJKILLER: full retard again
JJKILLER: every game
JJKILLER: hv u landed any hook
JJKILLER: worst decision
JJKILLER: cuz i didnt follow your decision?
JJKILLER: ur calls are shit
JJKILLER: let them end
JJKILLER: im not playing with this clown bot
JJKILLER: ur talking shit
JJKILLER: cuz i didnt follow your shit calls
JJKILLER: look at this bot
JJKILLER: clowns
JJKILLER: 4/14
JJKILLER: idk
JJKILLER: hes a clown
JJKILLER: hes mad cuz i didnt follow his shit calls

replies.body:
> The chat restrict system is beyond retarded

My number one point of feedback would be to stop calling everything and everyone retarded.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6v5VXyXT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-23T22:28:23.787+0000)
>
> My number one point of feedback would be to stop calling everything and everyone retarded.

K I'll take that. However, look at this tantram, http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2581190605/202685555?tab=overview. This thresh swapped his build way before game ended and fed nonstop in mid.

> [{quoted}](name=JJKILLER,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6v5VXyXT,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-08-23T22:32:10.782+0000)
>
> K I'll take that. However, look at this tantram, http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2581190605/202685555?tab=overview. This thresh swapped his build way before game ended and fed nonstop in mid.

And he is a different player than you, at a different point in the detection system. With a game that obvious the system should catch him pretty quickly, but it's not always immediate.

Also, please don't call out specific players on the boards -- it is against the Universal Rules.

Regardless of their behavior that doesn't mean that yours gets a free pass just because others were behaving worse. Between the name calling, insults and just overall negativity you cant honestly believe that this isnt clear cut punish worthy behavior.

JKILLER: lmao you are retarded
JJKILLER: just ff
JJKILLER: you cant win if ur shit
JJKILLER: yi is stupid
JJKILLER: i gave up trying with retards

JJKILLER: full retard again
JJKILLER: look at this bot
JJKILLER: clowns
JJKILLER: 4/14
JJKILLER: idk
JJKILLER: hes a clown
JJKILLER: hes mad cuz i didnt follow his shit calls



Seems to be working as intended.

> [{quoted}](name=Beas7ie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6v5VXyXT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-23T22:25:26.425+0000)
>
> JKILLER: lmao you are retarded
> JJKILLER: just ff
> JJKILLER: you cant win if ur shit
> JJKILLER: yi is stupid
> JJKILLER: i gave up trying with retards
> 
> JJKILLER: full retard again
> JJKILLER: look at this bot
> JJKILLER: clowns
> JJKILLER: 4/14
> JJKILLER: idk
> JJKILLER: hes a clown
> JJKILLER: hes mad cuz i didnt follow his shit calls
> 
> 
> 
> Seems to be working as intended.

they were feeding nonstop at that point.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2581190605/202685555?tab=overview
what u cant call him a retard/clown when hes running mid and feed with 6 tears? Should I say ntnt gjgjgj and report them in the end knowing that they wont get punished for feeding?

> [{quoted}](name=JJKILLER,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6v5VXyXT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-23T22:30:08.324+0000)
>
> they were feeding nonstop at that point.
> http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2581190605/202685555?tab=overview
> what u cant call him a retard/clown when hes running mid and feed with 6 tears? Should I say ntnt gjgjgj and report them in the end knowing that they wont get punished for feeding?



You can't call him a retard/clown under ANY circumstances.  If they're really feeding then report them after the game.  Download the replay and send it to customer support.


Anyways if they're deliberately trolling, a lot of times they WANT you to rage and flame at them.   Their GOAL is to keep you upset.  You want them to stop then you need to not feed them.
The goddamn irony of this post is palpable.
